issue.title: [Release][Python] Set release verification script to use target source instead of current source directory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14749](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14749). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When verifying wheels, one needs to download test data in the cloned source directory. The correct behavior is for the script to use data downloaded by the script in the temporary testing directory. See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11562#discussion_r751813452 for more details
